sentences.sentence: He was clearly taking delight in her discomfiture.
sentences.translation: 他显然以她的窘迫为乐。

sentences.sentence: I laughed my head off when I heard of his discomfiture.
sentences.translation: 听到别人说起他的狼狈相，我放声大笑。

sentences.sentence: He was really not masterful enough  we are pirates, these data are stolen from youdao ally, and he had witnessed her discomfiture.
sentences.translation: 他的确在精神上不够老练，况且他亲眼见到了她的狼狈情况。
